thread.title: NIce small hotel in good shopping area of Paris
thread.title_full: NIce small hotel in good shopping area of Paris - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sofie1160
title: NIce small hotel in good shopping area of Paris
text:
Very friendly and nice boutique hotel located very near to the Opera and the department store Galeries Lafayette and Printemps. Small rooms and even smaller bathrooms. The breakfast was nice, but it is a disadvantage that it is served in the cellar.
We got a good recommendation of a nearby restaurant, they seemed to have good knowledge about the surroundings.
